title: MIP 19: Move idle mAssets in Feeder Pool to Rari Fuse Lending Markets
body:
[MIP-19](https://mips.mstable.org/MIPS/mip-19.html) proposes to increase the capital efficiency of mAssets in Feeder Pools, starting with mUSD in the alUSD Feeder Pool and mBTC in TBTC/mBTC Feeder Pool which currently sit idly by deploying it into Rari Fuse.

This change will move idle mUSD and mBTC from mUSD/alUSD and mBTC/tBTC Feeder Pools into Rari Fuse and enable it for borrowing, bootstrapping mUSD and mBTC liquidity in Fuse.

**Should we move forward and create a proposal as PDP-35?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
